title: Portfolio Days 3 sans serifs - Andale Mono, ???, Neutraface {Patricia, Yves}
content:
Hi there,

Can anyone help me figure out these three typefaces?

Thanks,  
Meghana

(edit: ah, i added another file...)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [eur\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/typophile.com/files/eur_font.jpg) | 139.04 KB |
| [links\_font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/typophile.com/files/links_font.jpg) | 214.63 KB |

 [‹ (x) Death Cab for Cutie "Direction To Plans" - Futura {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17485 "Go to previous forum topic") [Smart Money sans serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17481 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mkhandekar

comments.content:
Smaller font looks to be Neutraface from House Industries.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18&subpage=viewfonts")
Yeah I’d agree that the smaller is Neutraface. Is the top something from Lineto?

The first one is [Andale Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/andale-mono/).

Two out of three, one to go.

Ill take a wild guess, _again_, and state that I think the mysterious last one is ’_one of those_’ free fonts _( But, ’ [Mayo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/mayo.asp)’, by [Peter Bruhn](http://web.archive.org/web/20080429224949/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Peter%252BBruhn), may be a lovely alternate :)_

Dav
That mystery font reminds me of something from Acme Fonts, but their website is down right now.

Thank you to everyone who responded! Thanks so much for the help.... I think I can find a substitute for the mystery font. :)

sincerely and cordially,  
meg
